classifyLLM: Tidy LLM-Powered Classification

Source: R/zzz.R
classifyLLM.Rd

Classify character vectors into predefined categories using a Large Language Model (LLM) from OpenAI, designed to fit naturally into tidyverse pipelines (e.g., mutate()). Includes helpers for prompts and safe fallbacks.

See also

Useful links:

  • https://github.com/dante042/classifyLLM

  • Report bugs at https://github.com/dante042/classifyLLM/issues
